snippet.title: Fitment - A Cozy Fitness Mobile Game for iPhone and Android | Early Access Trailer
snippet.description:
🐶 Finding motivation to regularly exercise on your own is hard. That’s where ✨Fitment!✨ can help! Fitment is a mobile game designed to make exercise more approachable.

Even with only a few spare minutes, you can fit cozy, accessible, and effective exercise into your day.

Fitment isn't just a fitness app, but a wholesome and cozy game with:
🧁 Bite-size workouts
📺 Decorate your world
👯 Team up with friends

---

More about Fitment:
✅Easy-to-use✅: Our interface is clean, simple, and intuitive. No matter your age or game experience, you’ll easily be able to join in on the adventure.

📣Helpful Push Notifications📣: You set the frequency of workout reminders, so even if you lose track of time, your fitbuddy has your back.

🛋️Collect Them All 🛋️:
➕Furniture! Accessories! Outfits! Characters! Pets! There are so many cool things to collect!
➕Unlock new exercise moves as you go so your workouts stay fresh and interesting!

💚Health Benefits💚: Studies show that exercising for even a few minutes a day DOES matter and adds up. Fitment helps you form a good habit that helps improve your mental and physical wellbeing.

---

https://www.playfitment.com

---
Fitment by Glossbird 
Through gamification, our studio is trying to create wellness for gamers through games.
https://www.glossbird.com
